entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 near midnight then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
